alert.note: Alert for Champaign (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 29 at 6:24AM CDT until June 29 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 AM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL PIATT AND SOUTHWESTERN CHAMPAIGN COUNTIES... At 623 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Mahomet, or 7 miles west of Champaign, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Public reported quarter size hail near Mahomet at 615. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe storm will be near... Bondville around 630 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Champaign, Urbana, Savoy and Tolono. This includes the following highways... Interstate 57 between mile markers 226 and 243. Interstate 72 between mile markers 174 and 182. Interstate 74 between mile markers 168 and 188. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
